text: [Music]
in this segment I'd like to dive deeper
into s3 intelligent hearing one of our
newest storage classes to join Amazon s3
in the first cloud storage class to
automatically deliver cost savings based
on changing access patterns without
sacrificing availability or performance
sometimes it is difficult to anticipate
a datasets access patterns especially if
the dataset is new when access patterns
are unknown choosing the wrong storage
class can be costly if you choose s3
standard you may accrue costs for
frequent access that you may quickly
realize you don't need choosing a
storage class for infrequent access may
also seem logical but you may end up
paying retrieval fees if your data is
regularly needed s3 intelligent tea
range is the first cloud storage class
to deliver automatic cost savings by
moving objects between two data access
tiers so that customers no longer have
to worry about committing their data to
the incorrect storage class the to
access tiers with in Amazon s3
intelligent Tyrian include a frequent
accessed here with the same price as s3
standard and a lower in frequent access
tier with the same price as s3 standard
ia for a small monthly monitoring on
automation feed per object s3
intelligent tearing monitors and learns
access patterns to your objects stored
in it and learns what should be moved to
the less frequent access tier
objects that are uploaded directly to s3
intelligent tearing or transferred from
s3 standard or s3 standard ia are by
default stored in the frequent access
tier if an object is not accessed in 30
consecutive days s3 intelligent Tyrion
will automatically move it to the
lower-cost tier if the object is
accessed later it will move back to the
frequent access tier there is no
retrieval fees and no additional tearing
fees when objects are moved between the
access tiers
this means objects and s3 intelligent
tearing are always available when needed
stored costs efficiently and have the
same high performance as s3 standard
thanks for watching stay tuned to learn
more about s3 bycicle management
features and how you can configure
policies to move your data between s3
storage classes for maximum cost
efficiencies for more information please
visit our website
you
